Posts.Content: I am confused. Is taking CBD oil not a good idea if you are trying not to get cancer again?? I will be taking Arimidex- how do I know if CBD oil is safe to take while taking Arimidex? I have been using it for pain control for a month and a half after surgery. Edited December 28, 2018 at 4:41 pm
Posts.Title: Immunosupressive properties of cannabis.
